description:
Learning how to improve your design skills is one of the most important things you can make in your design career. In this course we'll go over the entire process of creating a poster/flyer, from start to end.Adobe Photoshop is one of the most powerful image manipulation software there is It is the industry standard for the creation of logos, poster design and artwork.What are the requirements? General computer skills, a three button mouse will be useful for moving around but is not required and we will be working with Adobe Photoshop. What am I going to get from this course? lectures and 1 hour of content, create professional designs in Photoshop and have an excellent understanding of tools in Photoshop. What is the target audience? all skill level, People interested in working in the graphic design industry and persons who want to create great looking content

This course is a series of tutorials aiming to solve the "real world" problems graphic designers face in their day-to-day client requests. 

All the tutorials on this course offer practical demonstrations of how to use the Photoshop and Illustrator software in your design business.

Although the tutorials are practical examples of work a graphic designer does, they are also fun, impressive examples of what you can achieve with this powerful software.

Adding  in Photoshop
Increasing contrast to a product image to make it look better
Improving images in Photoshop generally
How to make pop art in Photoshop
How to remove backgrounds and cut around images in Photoshop
Creating and saving graphics in and Photoshop
All the tutorials are easy to follow with complete step-by-step instructions with menu commands and keystroke shortcuts.
Dive right in with Real World Graphic Designs. You'll creating graphics within minutes!
What are you waiting for?
title: Beginners Guide: Photoshop Poster/Artwork
